mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation by making menu items more touch-friendly and enhancing the mobile layout for a smoother experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and implement lazy loading to reduce the page load time on mobile and desktop.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance on-page SEO by including more optimized meta descriptions, header tags, and alt text for images.
userExperienceTip: Improve accessibility features like text contrast and implement a more consistent design language across pages.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing unnecessary steps and improving the clarity of form inputs.
tips: Optimize website images to improve load speed
